meanings.sent1: The bank securitized the mortgages to create investment opportunities.
meanings.sent2: Investors securitized the loans to reduce risk and increase liquidity.
meanings.sent3: The magician securitized the playing cards to make them disappear.
meanings.sent4: She securitized her ideas into a well-structured presentation.
meanings.sent5: The chef securitized the ingredients into a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: To make (an asset) secure by collateralizing it.
meanings.sent1: The company securitized the property to obtain a loan.
meanings.sent2: Homeowners securitized their homes to access funds for renovations.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel securitized its acorns by burying them in different locations.
meanings.sent4: He securitized his memories by writing them down in a journal.
meanings.sent5: The farmer securitized the livestock by building a sturdy fence.
